glsa.title: Nagios: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Nagios, the worst of which may allow remote code execution.

background.p: Nagios is an open source host, service and network monitoring program.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Nagios. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code, cause a Denial of Service condition, or obtain sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Nagios users should upgrade to the latest version:
